title: Textile, "Hover", 1985
medium: Technique: screen print on plain weave using fiber reactive dyes. Seven screen dots on the unprinted strip on the left selvedge. Four grays, three yellows.
inscribed: On the unprinted strip on right selvedge: " "HOVER" c 1985 BY CAROLYN RAY adapted by Dana Gorner"
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 276.2 x 140.3 cm (9 ft. 3/4 in. x 55 1/4 in.)
Straight repeat H x W: 28.3 x 66.4 cm (11 1/8 x 26 1/8 in.)
description: Blurred checkerboard of mustard yellow and grey squares.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Hover", 1985.
1985. Technique: screen print on plain weave using fiber reactive dyes. Seven screen dots on the unprinted strip on the left selvedge. Four grays, three yellows.. Gift of Carolyn Ray Inc.. 1988-91-4.
